name: ParasitesCausingEncephalitisTestsForParasitesCausingEncephalitisNucleicAcidInCerebrospinalFluid
title: Parasites [Causing Encephalitis] (Tests for Parasites Causing Encephalitis Nucleic Acid in Cerebrospinal Fluid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the Nucleic Acid of Encephalitis-causing Parasites in Cerebrospinal Fluid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Encephalitis-causing Parasite),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
